descriptionPlain:
Launched in 2013, ManoMano is the European leader
specialised in DIY, home improvement and gardening online. ManoMano brings together the largest offer of DIY & gardening
online products. With more than 3600 seller partners and 10 million products, ManoMano brings together the largest offer
across 6 countries : France, Belgium, Spain, Italy, Germany, United Kingdom. 

We currently are 850 Manas & Manos,
including a quarter of international talents and 24 nationalities, working in our 4 offices (Paris x2, Bordeaux and
Barcelona). People are at the heart of ManoMano’s culture around our 3 core values : boldness, ingenuity and
care.

Joining us is a tremendous human and business adventure ! We offer an ideal and (hyper)dynamic environment to
put your skills on innovative and concrete projects on a European scale.
 
Take a look at our Blog :
https://medium.com/manomano-tech

As a Mobile Developer you will be involved in:

Responsibilities

· Design the
Architecture of the Mobile Applications with clean code. 
· Build pixel-perfect, buttery smooth UIs across mobile
platforms. 
· Share code beetween a React-Native applications and a ReactJS website.
· Audit the native performance
bottlenecks and fix bugs. 
· Write unit and integration tests. 

Requirements

· Degree in Engineering.
· + 5
years of experience as a Software Engineer, with 2+ years
in react native
· High knowledge of React, Redux,
redux-saga, ES6, Typescript
and Javascript
. Specific knowledge of react-native and react-navigation
. iOS or Android
development
. E2E testing (appium, detox)
. CI/CD automation knowledge (bitrise, fastlane, etc)
. Play Store, App
store flows.
. Firebase analytics, crashlytics
· Knowledge in Restful API
· Working experience in Git (Github,
Gitlab, Bitbucket), JIRA,
Confluence and Slack.
· Good level of English.
description:
Launched in 2013, ManoMano is the European leader specialised in DIY, home improvement and gardening online.  ManoMano brings together the largest offer of DIY & gardening online products. With more than 3600 seller partners and 10 million products, ManoMano brings together the largest offer across 6 countries : France, Belgium, Spain, Italy, Germany, United Kingdom.

We currently are 850 Manas & Manos, including a quarter of international talents and 24 nationalities, working in our 4 offices (Paris x2, Bordeaux and Barcelona). People are at the heart of ManoMano’s culture around our 3 core values : boldness, ingenuity and care.

Joining us is a tremendous human and business adventure ! We offer an ideal and (hyper)dynamic environment to put your skills on innovative and concrete projects on a European scale.
 
Take a look at our Blog : https://medium.com/manomano-tech

As a Mobile Developer you will be involved in:

Responsibilities

· Design the Architecture of the Mobile Applications with clean code.
· Build pixel-perfect, buttery smooth UIs across mobile platforms.
· Share code beetween a React-Native applications and a ReactJS website.
· Audit the native performance bottlenecks and fix bugs.
· Write unit and integration tests.

Requirements

·  Degree in Engineering.
·  + 5 years of experience as a Software Engineer, with 2+ years
in react native
·  High knowledge of React, Redux, redux-saga, ES6, Typescript
and Javascript
.  Specific knowledge of react-native and react-navigation
.  iOS or Android development
.  E2E testing (appium, detox)
.  CI/CD automation knowledge (bitrise, fastlane, etc)
.  Play Store, App store flows.
.  Firebase analytics, crashlytics
·  Knowledge in Restful API
·  Working experience in Git (Github, Gitlab, Bitbucket), JIRA,
Confluence and Slack.
·  Good level of English.

descriptionPlain:
Launched in 2013, ManoMano is the European
leader specialised in DIY, home improvement and gardening online. ManoMano brings together the largest offer of DIY &
gardening online products. With more than 3600 seller partners and 10 million products, ManoMano brings together the
largest offer across 6 countries : France, Belgium, Spain, Italy, Germany, United Kingdom. 

We currently are 850
Manas & Manos, including a quarter of international talents and 24 nationalities, working in our 4 offices (Paris x2,
Bordeaux and Barcelona). People are at the heart of ManoMano’s culture around our 3 core values : boldness, ingenuity
and care.

Joining us is a tremendous human and business adventure ! We offer an ideal and (hyper)dynamic environment
to put your skills on innovative and concrete projects on a European scale.
 
Take a look at our Blog :
https://medium.com/manomano-tech

Nous recherchons un(e) alternant(e) dans les équipes acquisitions pour développer le
programme d’affiliation ManoMano en France et en Europe et accompagner la croissance de ManoMano sur notre stratégie
media performance.
Début souhaité : début janvier pour une durée d’un an.

Les Chantiers Sont Nombreux Et
Passionnants

1.Fidéliser les tops affiliés et développer leur revenu moyen

Accompagner les top affiliés dans le
déploiement de leur dispositif.
Les conseiller pour les aider à monétiser leur site.
Établir avec les tops affiliés
des plans de mise en avant afin de relayer le calendrier commercial ManoMano.

2.Identifier et recruter les futurs top
affiliés ManoMano

Déployer des stratégies de prospection automatisables avec l’équipe ‘Growth Engineering’ afin
d’identifier des affiliés potentiels sur le web et les amener à rejoindre nos programmes d’affiliation.

3.Activer et
animer le réseau d’affiliés

Via une stratégie d’animation forte (challenge affilié, newsletter, envoi des information
sur les tops ventes, contacts quotidiens etc.) augmenter la part du réseau d’affiliés faisant activement la promotion de
ManoMano.

Media (50% of your time)
Gérer et optimiser les campagnes d’acquisition sur Facebook et Criteo dans une
logique ROIste.
Être force de proposition sur les améliorations et nouveautés à apporter à nos campagnes
d’acquisition.
Monitorer les performances de ces campagnes via la création de dashboards adaptés.
Travailler en
étroite collaboration avec les équipes communication & media sur nos sujets transverses.

4.Piloter les performances
des actions mises en place tout en contrôlant la rentabilité des actions engagées 


Profil Recherché
Tu es
curieux(se), adaptable et autonome, tu t’épanouis dans un environnement changeant et stimulant
Tu as d’excellentes
capacités analytiques
Tu es organisé(e) et rigoureux (se)
Tu parles couramment l’anglais et l’une de ces langues :
allemand, italien et ou espagnol (natif / native idéalement)
Tu es un(e) bon(ne) communicant(e), avec la capacité de
résoudre les problèmes en équipe,
Tu es audacieux(se) et aimes prendre des risques pour résoudre des problèmes
complexes.
Tu fais preuve d’ingéniosité pour avancer, tu aimes tester et expérimenter jusqu’à trouver la meilleure
solution,
Tu as une première expérience (stage ou alternance) dans le digital et tu te passionnes pour ce
domaine

Les plus
Tu as l’âme d’un(e) chasseur(se) téléguidé(e) par la data, le business development te passionnent,
tes qualités de prospection et de négociation sont reconnues
Tu as une bonne compréhension des enjeux du marketing
digital
Tu as le goût du bricolage et du jardinage

As a Senior Frontend Developer you will be involved
in:

Responsibilities

· To analyze, design and develop new features with a high level of quality.
· To learn
through the sharing of good practices.
· To ensure optimal test coverage.
· To work in CD/CI.
· To follow your
metrics in order to improve the product during the next iterations.
· Mentoring and coaching the other more junior team
members.

Requirements

· + 7 years of experience as a Frontend Developer.
· High knowledge of React, Redux,
redux-saga, ES6, Typescript and Javascript.
· High knowledge of CSS, SaSS.
· High Knowledge of react testing library
and E2E testing (cypress, testcafe).
· High knowledge about Caching strategies and Performance optimization.
· High
Understanding of Micro-service Architecture, Design Patterns and Frontend Architecture.
· High knowledge about DOM
interactions.
· Server Side Rendering (SSR).
· Knowledge in Restful API.
· Previous experience in Cloud Architecture
(AWS, GCP or Azure).
· Docker and other Platforms as a Service (Kubernetes, ECS, Docker Swarm).
· Working experience
in Git (Github, Gitlab, Bitbucket), JIRA, Confluence and Slack.
· CI/CD Automation knowledge.
· High level of
English.

Nice to have:

- NodeJS
- GraphQL
- NextJS

descriptionPlain:
Launched in 2013, ManoMano is the European leader
specialised in DIY, home improvement and gardening online. ManoMano brings together the largest offer of DIY & gardening
online products. With more than 3600 seller partners and 10 million products, ManoMano brings together the largest offer
across 6 countries : France, Belgium, Spain, Italy, Germany, United Kingdom. 

We currently are 850 Manas & Manos,
including a quarter of international talents and 24 nationalities, working in our 4 offices (Paris x2, Bordeaux and
Barcelona). People are at the heart of ManoMano’s culture around our 3 core values : boldness, ingenuity and
care.

Joining us is a tremendous human and business adventure ! We offer an ideal and (hyper)dynamic environment to
put your skills on innovative and concrete projects on a European scale.
 
Take a look at our Blog :
https://medium.com/manomano-tech

Background & Missions

ManoMano, already positioned as European leader in DIY,
wants to propose the best online experience in DIY ecommerce. Our company is growing fast and wants to structure its
teams. We are looking for a Staff Software Engineer in Barcelona to drive a feature team on one of the Catalog
perimeter. 
This team is in charge of the customer experience around shipments. Leveraging on services to track
customer packages during their delivery journey and providing a service to return a defective or inappropriate product
easily.

At ManoMano we love and aspire to :

- Push often and serenely to production
- Software craftsmanship:
clean code, testing, peer programming, code review…
- Monitor code and functionalities (mistakes, product metrics)
-
Take 
advantage of containers flexibility (docker)
- Leverage cloud scalability (AWS)
- Migrate to micro-services and
event-based architectures
- Cultivating CI / CD and Agility 

Responsibilities
You will join a team, composed of 2
to 5 members, in order to create, in collaboration with the product and UX / UI teams, an amazing experience for the
merchants and the customers.

As a Staff Software Engineer in this team, you will have to : 

- Design and develop
features with a high quality standard
- Assimilate business context and company expectations to be creative and
relevant

description:
Launched in 2013, ManoMano is the European leader specialised in DIY, home improvement and gardening online.  ManoMano brings together the largest offer of DIY & gardening online products. With more than 3600 seller partners and 10 million products, ManoMano brings together the largest offer across 6 countries : France, Belgium, Spain, Italy, Germany, United Kingdom.

We currently are 850 Manas & Manos, including a quarter of international talents and 24 nationalities, working in our 4 offices (Paris x2, Bordeaux and Barcelona). People are at the heart of ManoMano’s culture around our 3 core values : boldness, ingenuity and care.

Joining us is a tremendous human and business adventure ! We offer an ideal and (hyper)dynamic environment to put your skills on innovative and concrete projects on a European scale.
 
Take a look at our Blog : https://medium.com/manomano-tech

Background & Missions

ManoMano, already positioned as European leader in DIY, wants to propose the best online experience in DIY ecommerce. Our company is growing fast and wants to structure its teams. We are looking for a Staff Software Engineer in Barcelona to drive a feature team on one of the Catalog perimeter. 
This team is in charge of the customer experience around shipments. Leveraging on services to track customer packages during their delivery journey and providing a service to return a defective or inappropriate product easily.

At ManoMano we love and aspire to :

- Push often and serenely to production
- Software craftsmanship: clean code, testing, peer programming, code review…
- Monitor code and functionalities (mistakes, product metrics)
- Take
advantage of containers flexibility (docker)
- Leverage cloud scalability (AWS)
- Migrate to micro-services and event-based architectures
- Cultivating CI / CD and Agility 

Responsibilities
You will join a team, composed of 2 to 5 members, in order to create, in collaboration with the product and UX / UI teams, an amazing experience for the merchants and the customers.

As a Staff Software Engineer in this team, you will have to : 

- Design and develop features with a high quality standard
- Assimilate business context and company expectations to be creative and relevant
- Learn & teach through code reviewsImprove the quality and testing of technical components
- Deploy your code up to production and be involved in monitoring it
- Creative / Innovative
- Data Driven in decision making

Requirements

- Experience as a Backend Developer.
- Java 8, 11, Lambda functions
- SpringBoot, Hibernate, JPA
- Java Reactive, WebFlux
- High understanding of Micro-service Architecture: DDD, SOLID, Distributed Systems architecture.
- Knowledge in Restful API & Event Sourcing & CQRS (Kafka, RabbitMQ ...)
- Relational Databases
- Previous experience in AWS Cloud.
- Knowledge in Monitoring, Alerting
- CI/CD Automation
- Unit Testing, Acceptance Testing, Integration Testing, Load, Testing, Contract Testing 
- Docker and Platforms as a Service (Kubernetes, ECS, Docker Swarm)
- High level of English.

additionalPlain:
Benefits

· Permanent contract.
· 30 working days of holidays.
· Full flexibility policy. Choose the days you want to come to
the office!
· Flexible working hours
· Career development: 4 weekly hours dedicated to training with digital and
interactive platforms. English trainings included.
· Medical assurance provided by AXA (full paid by the company).
·
Gym provided by Andjoy (full paid by the company).
· Ticket restaurant and ticket transport provided by Sodexo
(flexible remuneration).
· ManoMano monthly discounts.
· Online and onsite workshops, meetups, team buildings and
company meetings.
· Social responsible and sustainable actions like Women in Tech, IT Academy (converting profiles to
the IT sector), participation to a Food Bank, Clothes Bank, KM0 providers, Recycling, Sustainable Offices, among
others.

#LI-ISG


We're actively seeking applications from candidates of all backgrounds.

If all the above
rings a bell, it probably means that we are meant to meet each other ! Please get in touch.« So, come and plant the
seeds of your success and gather the fruits of your labour »

The information collected on this form is recorded in a
file used by ManoMano - Colibri SAS so that we can process your application. 
The data is kept for 2 years from the
date of your application. You can access your data, rectify it, request its deletion or exercise your right to limit the
processing of your data. You can also exercise your right to the portability of your data. Consult the cnil.fr website
for more information on your rights. 
To exercise these rights or if you have any questions about the processing of
your data under this scheme, you can contact our data protection officer by writing to dpo@manomano.com. 
If, after
having contacted us, you feel that your "Data Protection" rights have not been respected, you may submit a complaint
to the CNIL.

ManoMano, already positioned as European leader in DIY, wants to propose the best online experience in DIY ecommerce. Our company is growing fast and wants to structure its teams. We are looking for a Java Backend Developer in Barcelona to drive a feature team on one of the Buyers perimeter. 

At ManoMano we love and aspire to :

- Push often and serenely to production
- Software craftsmanship: clean code, testing, peer programming, code review…
- Monitor code and functionalities (mistakes, product metrics)
- Take advantage of containers flexibility (docker)
- Leverage cloud scalability (AWS)
- Migrate to micro-services and event-based architectures
- Cultivating CI / CD and Agility 

Responsibilities

You will join a team, composed of 2 to 5 members, in order to create, in collaboration with the product and UX / UI teams, an amazing experience for the merchants and the customers.

As a software engineer in this team, you will have to :

- Design and develop features with a high quality standard
- Assimilate business context and company expectations to be creative and relevant
- Learn & teach through code reviewsImprove the quality and testing of technical components
- Deploy your code up to production and be involved in monitoring it

Technical stack :

MicroservicesJava >= 8 with SpringBoot 2 / Kotlin
React (Next.js)
MySQL, Postgre
RabbitMQ, Kafka
Redis
Git / Gitlab
AWS

Requirements 

- +7 years of experience as a backend developer
- Soul of a leader and like to drive teams
- Creative / Innovative
- Data Driven in decision making
- Fluent in english
- Autonomous and adaptable (able to work in a constantly changing environment)
- Team spirit and excellent interpersonal skills, as well as a good sense of humor!
- Curious with a strong desire to test and experiment new solutions in your work
- New technologies / e-commerce have no secrets for you

descriptionPlain:
Launched in 2013, ManoMano is the European leader
specialised in DIY, home improvement and gardening online. ManoMano brings together the largest offer of DIY & gardening
online products. With more than 3600 seller partners and 10 million products, ManoMano brings together the largest offer
across 6 countries : France, Belgium, Spain, Italy, Germany, United Kingdom. 

We currently are 850 Manas & Manos,
including a quarter of international talents and 24 nationalities, working in our 4 offices (Paris x2, Bordeaux and
Barcelona). People are at the heart of ManoMano’s culture around our 3 core values : boldness, ingenuity and
care.

Joining us is a tremendous human and business adventure ! We offer an ideal and (hyper)dynamic environment to
put your skills on innovative and concrete projects on a European scale.
 
Take a look at our Blog :
https://medium.com/manomano-tech

The Catalog Gear

The Catalog Gear at Manomano is the sub-organization in Manomano
Tech, that is responsible for all the business processes, functionalities and systems that enable manomano to manage its
vast yet curated catalog of 10 Million products. 

- 5 feature teams and growing
- 30+ Microservices
- 3 Million
offers from sellers are processed per hour
- 800 RPS on one of our read-only databases that powers some part of the
visitor journey 

Our distributed systems heavily leverage Apache Kafka for streaming, our microservices are written
using either Java, Kotlin, GoLang among others. React is our toolbelt for writing UIs while we use K8S to run our
services. 

You can read more about our tech stack - https://medium.com/manomano-tech

The Catalog Gear at Manomano is the sub-organization in Manomano Tech, that is responsible for all the business processes, functionalities and systems that enable manomano to manage its vast yet curated catalog of 10 Million products. 

- 5 feature teams and growing
- 30+ Microservices

lists.text:
An Engineering Manager at Manomano is a
Manager of Managers, as such, your key responsibilities include
lists.content:
• Manage two or more Engineering Leads, each leading a Feature Team
  • Owning the engineering aspects of your organization - architecture, performance, maintenance, etc.
  • Coach your direct reports and their reports for their career growth including career development plans, trainings, budgeting, etc
  • Help your feature teams achieve their Objectives and improve their metrics
  • Implement process improvements, we practice Scaled Agile at Manomano
  • Conduct performance reviews by setting the right objectives and providing regular feedback
  • Develop an effective bi-directional feedback process where you share organisational context and foster a deep understanding of how feature teams and engineers operate
  • Lead the hiring and on-boarding of engineers in your organisation and the Catalog Gear

lists.text:
The Must
Haves. Previous experience at managing high-performance is a must, some of the traits that we would be looking for are
:
lists.content:
• 3+ years of experience managing managers/technical leads (15+ people)
  • Experience managing distributed/remote teams
  • Soul of a leader and likes to drive ambitious projects
  • Experience with large scale distributed systems and their architecture
  • Experience working Creative and Innovative yet Data Driven in decision making
  • Fluent in English
  • Team spirit and excellent interpersonal skills

• Servant leader is your middle name
  • Fluent in Spanish and/or French
  • Curious with a strong desire to test and experiment new solutions in your work
  • Experience in E-Commerce/Marketplaces
  • Experience in managing long term projects

Launched in 2013,
ManoMano is the European leader specialised in DIY, home improvement and gardening online. ManoMano brings together the
largest offer of DIY & gardening online products. With more than 3600 seller partners and 10 million products, ManoMano
brings together the largest offer across 6 countries : France, Belgium, Spain, Italy, Germany, United Kingdom. 

We
currently are 850 Manas & Manos, including a quarter of international talents and 24 nationalities, working in our 4
offices (Paris x2, Bordeaux and Barcelona). People are at the heart of ManoMano’s culture around our 3 core values :
boldness, ingenuity and care.

Joining us is a tremendous human and business adventure ! We offer an ideal and
(hyper)dynamic environment to put your skills on innovative and concrete projects on a European scale.
 
Take a look
at our Blog : https://medium.com/manomano-tech

JOB DESCRIPTION 

Main challenges
As Solutions Architect your
missions will be both challenging and fascinating: 
- Specify and maintain functional architecture of the platform 
-
Enable platform evolutivity in order to answer business needs
- Enable growth in terms of platform traffic and volume
but also in terms of number of technical contributors
- Provide long-term functional solutions
- Provide expertise to
ensure platform performance, ecosystem integration and flexibility
- Audit performance, security and reliability of
current systems
- Analyse issues and optimization points of technical architecture
- Define technical roadmap with the
other architects and the core developers
- Define and hold technical projects
- Coordinate strategy with business
teams and other technical teams (engineer managers, lead developer community, data science team, QA team, devops
team...) in an European context. 

REQUIREMENTS-
 6+ year experience in web (consulting/dev., retailers…)
- Fluent
in English (verbal and written)
- Like to communicate, curiosity, initiative, pragmatism in a collaborative and
challenging business & tech environment
- Skills to explain complicated systems to non technical teams
- An
understanding of the stakes of the company (DIY best in class platform & services, customer experience, data driven…)
-
Experience in solution design, implementing enterprise software solutions,- Experience in Data, API and events driven
architecture: data modelling and cartography, API & events design and governance. 

WE DO AT MANOMANO
- Software
craftsmanship: clean code, testing, code review...
- Devops: CI/CD, observability...
- React, PHP/Symfony, Java
SpringBoot, Python, Go, NodeJS, MariaDB, MongoDB, ElasticSearch, Redis, RabbitMQ, Docker, Linux, AWS…GSuite, Slack,
Confluence, Draw.io, JIRA...

With more than 3600 seller partners and 10 million products, ManoMano brings together the largest offer across 6 countries : France, Belgium, Spain, Italy, Germany, United Kingdom.

We currently are 850 Manas & Manos, including a quarter of international talents and 24 nationalities, working in our 4 offices (Paris x2, Bordeaux and Barcelona). People are at the heart of ManoMano’s culture around our 3 core values : boldness, ingenuity and care.

Take a look at our Blog : https://medium.com/manomano-tech

As part of its vision to offer the best experience in the DIY e-commerce space for both customers and sellers, ManoMano has launched Mano Fulfillment, a warehousing and fulfillment service already implanted in France, Spain and Italy. 
Our objective is to grow 20 times our fulfillment volume in the next 3 years, opening it in all our markets to help our sellers access our European markets in one click.
As a Fulfillment Account Manager, you will manage the business relationship with some of our partners and will be responsible for driving the sales done through our Fulfillment solution.

lists.text:
Manage your portfolio and make it grow fast with
our logistics solution:
lists.content:
• Negotiate with sellers to increase their assortment on ManoFulfillment as well as to strictly follow our stock recommendation,

  • Follow closely the performance indicators to optimize the sales,

  • Prepare and deliver Weekly and Monthly business reviews regarding progress and state of health for your key accounts,

  • Train and coach sellers on how to use the different tools offered by ManoFulfillment, to make them fully autonomous on the solution,

  • Proactively build joint business plans,

  • Act as a point of escalation for seller issues, questions, or concerns.

lists.text:
Build long term
ManoFulfillment solution, being the voice of ManoFulfillment Sellers:
lists.content:
• Analyze business performances and conduct in-depth analysis to identify growth opportunities on the fulfillment solution,

  • Continuously seek for sales, operational and process improvement identifying and managing projects to improve customer and selling partner experience,

  • Develop a thorough understanding of the competitive environment including knowledge of competitive product offerings.

• Excellence in Excel with very strong analytical skills required, SQL is a plus,
    •  
  • Excellent project management, ability to work with legal, product, and other internal business owners to reach mutually beneficial agreements,

  • Strong business judgment and negotiation skills: Autonomous, business driven, strong rigour,

  • Curious and passionate about innovation in Ecommerce/Marketplace,

  • Fluency in English and French, other European languages is a plus (German, Spanish, Italian).

• A start-up environment made in France in hyper growth
  • Autonomy with a wide field of action
  • An immersion in the data-driven e-commerce
  • Agile & international environment with bright and friendly colleagues
  • Telework possible one day/week
  • The international dimension (France, Italy, Spain, United Kingdom, Germany)
  • A pleasant setting in Paris in more than 3,000 m² (a gym, a terrace, a music room)
  • Our DIY workshop, free access!
  • Restaurant card, mutual, transportation, 7 weeks vacation/year

lists.content:
• You manage a portfolio of selected retailers & develop together with them an effective strategy to increase their performance on the ManoMano Marketplace:
  • Building and maintaining an extraordinary partnership with your trading partners
  • In-depth and continuous analysis of business development to identify growth potential
  • Creation and control of sales and profit goals as well as action plans to achieve and exceed these goals
  • Identification of unused seller potential and their development
  • Continuous improvement of sales and process flows
  • Cooperation and coordination with the international ManoMano teams to ensure holistic, cross-border seller support
  • Participation in the development of the sales strategy including the product range and condition policy as well as the appropriate sales promotion measures

    • You will also work actively on the creation and implementation of marketing measures for the German ManoMano platform:
  • Definition of promotional measures in cooperation with the marketing department
  • Creation of the product selection with seasonal relevance
  • Permanent negotiation of the best promotional prices with your sellers
  • Success control and continuous improvement of the efficiency and effectiveness of our advertising measures

• You have a sales education with business administration (e.g. university, university of applied sciences etc.), and have been able to prove yourself successfully in a position in sales, purchasing or consulting for at least two years, ideally in an e-commerce company.
  • You have excellent analytical thinking, are data-driven and have a good understanding and enthusiasm for e-commerce and the German retail landscape.
  • As a competent and eloquent conversation partner, you not only conduct negotiations with decision-makers at a high level, but also know the goals and potential of our dealers. You strive for growth in partnership and convince with a high level of customer and service understanding.
  • Business fluent knowledge of German and English are essential for this position.
  • You work independently and precisely, you have persuasiveness and assertiveness, you have team spirit and you are personable. At ManoMano we are primarily looking for great personalities.

• A start-up and great working atmosphere
  • Lots of autonomy and freedom in your work
  • Immerse yourself in the data-focused world of e-commerce
  • An international environment (France, Belgium, Italy, Spain, UK, Germany)
  • A great location in the heart of Paris with offices of 3000m² (with a fitness room, a wonderful terrace, a room to relax and many other surprises!) / Full remote policy possible anywhere in France or Germany
  • French and English classes
  • Our workshop for free use

descriptionPlain:
Launched in 2013, ManoMano is the European leader specialised in
DIY, home improvement and gardening online. ManoMano brings together the largest offer of DIY & gardening online
products. With more than 3600 seller partners and 10 million products, ManoMano brings together the largest offer across
6 countries : France, Belgium, Spain, Italy, Germany, United Kingdom. 

We currently are 850 Manas & Manos, including
a quarter of international talents and 24 nationalities, working in our 4 offices (Paris x2, Bordeaux and Barcelona).
People are at the heart of ManoMano’s culture around our 3 core values : boldness, ingenuity and care.

Joining us is
a tremendous human and business adventure ! We offer an ideal and (hyper)dynamic environment to put your skills on
innovative and concrete projects on a European scale.
 
Take a look at our Blog :
https://medium.com/manomano-tech

To consolidate its position as DIY and Gardening online leader, ManoMano has put
technology at the heart of its strategy.
We are convinced it is by fluidly delivering qualitatives products that we
will be able to offer our clients and merchants all the functionalities to revolutionise their online DIY experience.


As a fast growing company, we are always on the look for ingenious and passionate people.


The Agile team mission
is to support, train, and coach teams to reach a state of high-performance and self-organized teams.
To do so, the
agile team consist in 3 roles:
- Scrum Master focus on team efficiency
- Agile Coach focus on people skills and
autonomy
- Delivery Manager focus on synchronization to assure features delivery

Delivery Manager intervenes as soon
as an objective requires multiple feature teams to work together.


MAIN CHALLENGES

As Delivery Leader you will
:
- Build and de-risk the Program release plan with all participants involvement
- depending on the complexity and
seniority, you will be handling multiple programs. Programs are multiple feature teams working together to achieve a
main objective
- build, challenge and apply the process and tools of ManoMano Agile@scale framework
- be accountable
for the overall planning, coordination, execution, and delivery of value through the program with the Architect,
Engineering Manager and Group Product Manager. 

MAIN ACTIVITIES

Methodology
- Responsible to apply the process
and tools of ManoMano Agile@scale framework
- facilitate agile@scale events like multi-team refinement, quarter
planning, global demo, global sprint planning…
- assure visibility on program progress and risks within
stakeholders.

Release plan
- Work with the Architect, Engineering Manager and Group Product Manager to prioritize
features
- build and maintain the global release plan
- understand, visualize and manage dependencies
- develop and
follow a risk management strategy

Continuous improvement
- Drive delivery and continuous improvement by utilizing
feedback and metrics (quality, delivery rate, etc.) to identify areas of opportunity
- act as consultant/coach to
management in resolving unusually difficult problems
- challenge management and cross-functional teams to develop and
improve agile@scale best practices and processes.


#LI-Remote
#LI-Hybrid

lists.text: What we can offer you at ManoMano

  • MM employee discount

descriptionPlain:
Launched in 2013,
ManoMano is the European leader specialised in DIY, home improvement and gardening online. ManoMano brings together the
largest offer of DIY & gardening online products. With more than 3600 seller partners and 10 million products, ManoMano
brings together the largest offer across 6 countries : France, Belgium, Spain, Italy, Germany, United Kingdom. 

We
currently are 850 Manas & Manos, including a quarter of international talents and 24 nationalities, working in our 4
offices (Paris x2, Bordeaux and Barcelona). People are at the heart of ManoMano’s culture around our 3 core values :
boldness, ingenuity and care.

Joining us is a tremendous human and business adventure ! We offer an ideal and
(hyper)dynamic environment to put your skills on innovative and concrete projects on a European scale.
 
Take a look
at our Blog : https://medium.com/manomano-tech

The team:
The Platform Engineering will help build our future by
providing a global perimeter to address ManoMano business challenges carried by the Product teams. It is made of 6
teams.

Among those, the Spine team is the Foundation team for the Tech.

The spine team is organized around 3 areas
of expertise :
- the engineering to provide a strong technical engineering expertise and develop and maintain shared
bundles
- the architecture to set up a resilient, low coupled, reactive and elastic architecture and help Product and
IT to insure functional consistency across applications
- the infrastructure, to design and to maintain the platform
common backbone services.

The opportunity:
Fully integrated into the Spine team, you will learn the all the secret
of a powerful CDN ( Content Delivery Network ), all the traps and best use cases of caching for an e-commerce website.
You will discover the goal of the kind of solution architecture interconnected with web servers serving pages and assets
of our different websites. The aim is to provide the best user experience for our visitor and to maximize the efficiency
of our system.

You will:
- be fully integrated with the team in charge of the CDN
- take part on the design and
implementation of the new features
- interact with the feature teams to collect their needs
- build a robust
monitoring to get an efficient alerting
- be responsible of some part of the project

descriptionPlain:
Launched in 2013, ManoMano is the European leader specialised in
DIY, home improvement and gardening online. ManoMano brings together the largest offer of DIY & gardening online
products. With more than 3600 seller partners and 10 million products, ManoMano brings together the largest offer across
6 countries : France, Belgium, Spain, Italy, Germany, United Kingdom. 

We currently are 850 Manas & Manos, including
a quarter of international talents and 24 nationalities, working in our 4 offices (Paris x2, Bordeaux and Barcelona).
People are at the heart of ManoMano’s culture around our 3 core values : boldness, ingenuity and care.

Joining us is
a tremendous human and business adventure ! We offer an ideal and (hyper)dynamic environment to put your skills on
innovative and concrete projects on a European scale.
 
Take a look at our Blog :
https://medium.com/manomano-tech

En 2019, ManoMano a lancé en France sa plateforme dédiée aux professionnels du
bâtiment : ManoMano Pro.
L’équipe B2B Project est une équipe projet au rôle transverse, qui développe sa stratégie et
la met en œuvre opérationnellement en lien avec l'ensemble des équipes de l'entreprise (tech, produit, opérations,
business development, etc.). 
Fin 2020, nous avons ouvert notre plateforme professionnelle à deux nouveaux pays
(l’Espagne et l’Italie).

Nous sommes à la recherche d’un(e) stagiaire Business Analyst pour nous aider sur le
pilotage de la performance de ManoMano Pro. Tu seras ainsi en première ligne pour analyser la performance de nos
plateformes et la restituer à l’ensemble de l’équipe.

Ta mission ? Tu travailleras avec le Senior Business
Performance Manager de l’équipe et tu auras trois principales missions :

* Dashboard & KPIs
Chez ManoMano, la donnée
est au centre de toutes les décisions. Ton rôle sera d’aider à définir, suivre et analyser les principaux KPIs de
l’équipe B2B. Tu auras notamment un fort focus sur la comparaison de nos résultats entre nos différentes plateformes
internationales. Depuis le choix des indicateurs qui retranscrivent le mieux notre performance, à leur intégration et
automatisation dans nos documents de reporting, tu seras central(e) dans l’analyse continue de notre business. 

*
Analyses 
Ton rôle sera clé dans l’analyse du développement de l’offre Pro en France et à l’international. Tu seras
responsable d’analyses des performances de nos plateformes : collecte et formatage des données, retraitement, calcul et
choix des bons axes de comparaison, restitution et data visualisation. Exemples de sujets d’analyse : tendances de nos
ventes, comportement et profiling de nos clients, analyse d’impact d’une initiative marketing, etc.

* Suivi et veille
marché
Tu devras également réaliser des analyses sur notre marché et nos concurrents. Tu devras collecter des données
externes qui nous permettront de mieux comprendre les tendances globales du marché et leurs impacts sur nos chiffres. Tu
effectueras également de la veille pour nous permettre de rester informés des dernières tendances et
innovations.

Profil recherché :
Nous recherchons un profil ayant à la fois un fort esprit analytique et un sens
business aigu. Idéalement tu :
- es étudiant(e) dans une école d’ingénieur ou de commerce, à la recherche d’un contrat
de stage à compter de mars 2022
- as une excellente maîtrise d’Excel / Gsheet
- es désireux(se) d’apprendre le SQL 
-
es à l’aise en anglais, à l’oral comme à l’écrit 
- es organisé(e), rigoureux(se) et tu t’adaptes rapidement
- as
envie d’évoluer dans un environnement digital

Chez ManoMano, nous recherchons avant tout des personnalités
bienveillantes, et qui sont ce qu’on aime appeler des « DOer » !

sales team will be based in ManoMano Paris office (République)

Joining us is a tremendous human and business adventure ! We offer an ideal and (hyper)dynamic environment to put your skills on innovative and concrete projects on a European scale.
 
Take a look at our Blog : https://medium.com/manomano-tech

Our team

The B2B sales team mission is to provide support both technical and digital to make sure our Pro clients buy easily on our platform and develop a repeat purchase habit. The B2B sales team is composed of ~50 agents split between our 3 regions: France, Southern Eurpope and Northern Europe, and a transversal support team in charge of performance, quality, training, tools and process.

Your mission? 

Advise and support our UK Pro customers and make human support the cornerstone of our customer experience! You will be a part of the new B2B Northern Europe Sales Team, you will report directly to the B2B Sales Manager - Northern Europe. The Northern Europe sales team will be based in ManoMano Paris office (République)

lists.content:
• Give the best support to pro customers who call us: accompany our pro into their purchases and Manomano Pro website’s handling
  • Generate additional BV through outbound calls, hot leads generated by existing customers (ex: abandoned cart) 
  • Give technical advice on our pro specialities: plumbing, sanitary, heating, electricity, toolings, construction works, etc.
  • Maximize satisfaction of our customer and stimulate repurchase: provide reinsurance on delivery and inventory, optimize shipping fees, etc.
  • Be a part of a new team! Participate in new Sales initiatives adapted to your market

• min 2-3 years degree (Bachelor’s degree)
  • 2-5 years of experience, including in sales or in an activity with customer contacts related to construction materials (plumbing / sanitary / heating, electricity, tooling…)
  • Good knowledge in products and expertise related to construction 
  • English native, French would be a plus
  • 100% customer centric
  • Good digital culture
  • Autonomous and adaptable (able to work in a constantly changing environment)
  • Team spirit and excellent interpersonal skills

• People: Smart/ diverse backgrounds / international environment/
  • A positive, supportive & dynamic atmosphere
  • Salary: competitive salary package
  • Sports: free gym 
  • Retreats/ fun: music room/ a terrace/ modern office/  Crafternoons every Thursday afternoon (share your knowledge, learn from others)/ External events attendance, fairs & Meetups
  • Food: all the coffee you can drink/ Restaurant card (Swile)
  • Transportation: 50% reimbursement
  • ManoMano: MM employee discount
  • Parents: flexible policies

Launched in 2013, ManoMano is
the European leader specialised in DIY, home improvement and gardening online. ManoMano brings together the largest
offer of DIY & gardening online products. With more than 3600 seller partners and 10 million products, ManoMano brings
together the largest offer across 6 countries : France, Belgium, Spain, Italy, Germany, United Kingdom. 

We currently
are 850 Manas & Manos, including a quarter of international talents and 24 nationalities, working in our 4 offices
(Paris x2, Bordeaux and Barcelona). People are at the heart of ManoMano’s culture around our 3 core values : boldness,
ingenuity and care.

Joining us is a tremendous human and business adventure ! We offer an ideal and (hyper)dynamic
environment to put your skills on innovative and concrete projects on a European scale.
 
Take a look at our Blog :
https://medium.com/manomano-tech

Within the Digital Marketing team, the Growth team is responsible for building the
next growth engines of ManoMano. Thanks to data-driven methods, Growth Engineers discover, experiment and industrialize
their own technical solutions. Supported by IT teams, they closely work with a large scope of stakeholders to get a
direct impact on their activity with automation & data applications. 


We are now looking for a Growth Engineer
dedicated to our B2B platform. If you want to create, experiment, and build end-to-end solutions that have a direct
impact on a strategic area of ManoMano, this job is for you!

Missions
- Partner with B2B teams to discover new
growth opportunities 
- You will build a productive relationship with B2B teams to identify problems and quickly test
technical solutions. If you join us, you could start with these promising questions : 
- How to detect and migrate
professional users to the B2B Platform? 
- How to optimise the acquisition of professionals in our core channels ? 
-
How to integrate more signals into the Sales Lead Generation Pipeline? 
- How to leverage data to improve the customer
journey?

- Scale the key assets of our growth strategy 
- Supported by other Growth Engineers & Data Engineers, you
will improve our existing projects and guarantee their scalability, robustness and observability in the long run.


-Improve the engineering practices of the team 
Our products are mainly based on the following tech stack: Python,
Snowflake, Airflow and AWS. You will learn, discover and implement the best development practices to improve both the
agility and efficiency of the team.


Skills
For this strategic position, ManoMano is looking for an
engineer/developer with both a business and experimental mindset. 
Must have
Masters degree or equivalent, preferably
in Computer Science, Engineering or related field
3+ years of experience where you demonstrated your ability to build
high value and scalable projects
Successful previous experience working with Python, PHP or other programming
languages
Analytical mindset to always validate ideas with data
Creativity to imagine solutions and develop them
through shortcuts
Ability to produce high quality deliverables, to synthesize and to communicate effectively
Fluency
in French and English
Mastery of SQL
Nice to have
Expertise with one data specialty : Web scraping, Data Science or
Data Engineering
Knowledge of classic marketing tools (Performance tracking, CRMs, Campaign Management)
Previous
experience in eCommerce or retail

descriptionPlain:
Launched in 2013, ManoMano is the European
leader specialised in DIY, home improvement and gardening online. ManoMano brings together the largest offer of DIY &
gardening online products. With more than 3600 seller partners and 10 million products, ManoMano brings together the
largest offer across 6 countries : France, Belgium, Spain, Italy, Germany, United Kingdom. 

We currently are 850
Manas & Manos, including a quarter of international talents and 24 nationalities, working in our 4 offices (Paris x2,
Bordeaux and Barcelona). People are at the heart of ManoMano’s culture around our 3 core values : boldness, ingenuity
and care.

Joining us is a tremendous human and business adventure ! We offer an ideal and (hyper)dynamic environment
to put your skills on innovative and concrete projects on a European scale.
 
Take a look at our Blog :
https://medium.com/manomano-tech

To consolidate its position as DIY and Gardening online leader, ManoMano has put
technology at the heart of its strategy.
We are convinced it is by fluidly delivering qualitatives products that we
will be able to offer our clients and merchants all the functionalities to revolutionise their online DIY experience.


As a fast growing company, we are always on the look for ingenious and passionate people.

Within the Marketing &
Data department, and directly reporting to the Head of Brand, Com, Media you will occupy a key position for the
organization, building, executing & monitoring our global go to market strategy in order to drive awareness and
consideration. 

Your missions:

Strategy & Vision: 
- Lead & implement the Brand Marketing strategy delivering
against the company vision and business goals, for owned, earned & paid channels :
-Brand advertising & experience
across the funnel
-Partnerships & events : defining clear, bold partnership strategy 
-Advocacy & communities :
consumer PR (France Only), influence & social community management
-Content : developing global framework & scalability
process, acting as a product team sparring partner 
-Operational Marketing: to support our commercial
performance

Implementation & scaling: 
-Drive innovative, bold & ingenious global go-to-market strategies
-Deliver
guidelines for international markets (FR/SP/IT/UK/DE), report progress / challenges, optimizations to maximize impact in
line with the company's customer-centric and data driven approach.
-Measure and monitor our strategy impact and
effectiveness, including brand health metrics and campaign measurement), report back on results and recommendations for
improvements 
-Develop processes, guidelines, audits etc. to ensure maximum ROI and global scaling. 
-Manage budget
with 100% accuracy & in full compliance with ManoMano guidelines
 
Leadership : 
-Drive, empower & coach a team of
high performing specialists (5+ persons)
-Drive global agencies to drive best in class results, and incremental growth
YoY
-Lead without authority : Provide leadership and coordination for all initiatives with cross-functional partners
ensuring marketing & product integration 
-Partner with Media Lead & Regional Marketing & Communications leads
(Northern/Southern Europe) ensuring consistency and maximum efficiency supporting regional needs & voice, as well as
their business ambition
-Masterfully communicate up/down/across the organization to ensure transparency, alignment, and
advocacy of our strategy, cultivating strong collaborative relationships

We are looking for an outstanding chinese speaking Business Developer to continue our growth story and help us drive our business to the next level.
Based in Paris and reporting to the Lead of Worldwide Sellers’ Partnerships, you will be in charge of accelerating ManoMano growth by identifying, recruiting and accompanying chinese sellers to become successful in all our european markets.
Your outstanding sales, organizational and communication skills, combined with your strong e-commerce knowledge will enable you to successfully operate and overachieve your objectives in a fast-moving environment.

lists.content:
• Identify: Search for the prospects having the highest potential on ManoMano to build your hunting list and prioritize your work. Identify and reach out to the right contact.
  • Pitch: Present ManoMano and convince the prospects to work with us.
  • Deal: Negotiate and secure the best business terms to ensure the highest chance to turn the partnership into success.
  • Develop: Manage the integration on our platforms and pilot the business and quality performance of your new sellers portfolio during their launching period.
  • Innovate: Overcome any obstacles autonomously with innovative solutions. Implement best practices.

• 2+ years of experience working in ecommerce sales, buying or account management
  • Strong understanding of the ecommerce and the retail industry
  • Fluent in English and Mandarin both written and spoken
  • Ability to communicate clearly and effectively with senior business leaders
  • Autonomous and adaptable, able to work in a constantly changing environment
  • You are a “hunter”:You love pitching and negotiating with business owners and senior leadership. Persistent, you never give up!
  • You have strong work rigour and analytical skills with the willingness to learn continuously in a demandingenvironment.

• People: Smart/ diverse backgrounds / international environment/ A positive, supportive & dynamic atmosphere
  • Work: office/ hybrid/ full remote  
  • Salary: competitive salary package
  • Technology: Get a laptop you love to do your best work
  • Time off: 7 weeks of paid vacation + vacation premium $$
  • Sports: free gym 
  • Healthcare: mutual (60% taken care by MM) 
  • Retreats/ fun: music room/ a terrace/ modern office/  Crafternoons every Thursday afternoon (share your knowledge, learn from others)/ External events attendance, fairs & Meetups / DIY workshops
  • Food: all the coffee you can drink/ Restaurant card (Swile)
  • Transportation: 50% reimbursement
  • MM employee discount
  • Parents: flexible policies

Take a look at our Blog :
https://medium.com/manomano-tech

Manomano is Europe's largest marketplace specialising in the DIY & Home Improvement
sector. We have been operating in the UK market since 2016 and have seen phenomenal sales growth over the last 5 years.
ManoMano is therefore looking for a Business Developer B2B UK. 
Within the ​Business Development team and reporting to
the Lead Business Developer UK, you will occupy a key role for ManoMano Pro's growth: the creation of seller
partnerships and building the product catalog for professionals.
You will identify, select, contact and negotiate
directly with existing merchants and future partner merchants, to guarantee the quality of the offer for building
professionals and the respect of our promise (price, availability ...). You will then monitor their performance and
ensure the commercial development of their activity to reach their full B2B sales potential.

With more than 3600 seller partners and 10 million products, ManoMano brings together the largest offer across 6 countries : France, Belgium, Spain, Italy, Germany, United Kingdom.

We currently are 850 Manas & Manos, including a quarter of international talents and 24 nationalities, working in our 4 offices (Paris x2, Bordeaux and Barcelona). People are at the heart of ManoMano’s culture around our 3 core values : boldness, ingenuity and care.

Manomano is Europe's largest marketplace specialising in the DIY & Home Improvement sector. We have been operating in the UK market since 2016 and have seen phenomenal sales growth over the last 5 years. ManoMano is therefore looking for a Business Developer B2B UK. 
Within the ​Business Development team and reporting to the Lead Business Developer UK, you will occupy a key role for ManoMano Pro's growth: the creation of seller partnerships and building the product catalog for professionals.
You will identify, select, contact and negotiate directly with existing merchants and future partner merchants, to guarantee the quality of the offer for building professionals and the respect of our promise (price, availability ...). You will then monitor their performance and ensure the commercial development of their activity to reach their full B2B sales potential.

lists.content:
• Build the professional catalog for ManoMano Pro:
  • Identify, select and recruit high potential merchants (manufacturers or distributors)
  • Benchmark their offer and analyze the relevance of their catalog according to the needs identified on the Pro ManoMano catalog
  • Contact them and negotiate the best conditions that will make the partnership a success
  • Own the creation of the partnership and overcome obstacles autonomously and with innovative solutions. 

  • Support partner merchants in the Pro catalog:
  • Support them in their integration on the platform
  • Monitor their performance and follow up on pricing
  • Set up commercial operations for our pros in partnership with merchants
  • Be the voice of our partners at the company level (sponsor internally any tech or non-tech initiatives)

• Competent and business oriented leader with minimum 2 years of relevant experience in business development and category management in the brand/manufacture industry.
  • Product knowledge and an appetite for the building industry are appreciated.
  • Proven success in market planning/analysis and opportunity identification.
  • Bac +5 graduated from a Business School / Engineering School (or equivalent university education).
  • Fluent english Mandatory
  • Data Driven, people know you for your analytical capabilities and experience with Excel, SQL and other data visualisation tools are a big plus
  • Autonomous and adaptable (able to work in a constantly changing environment).
  • Curious, with a strong desire to learn.
  • Proactive, collaborative and solutions oriented.
  • Excellent communication skills with the ability to be clear and concise at all levels of the business

• Fast growing start-up environment
  • International & agile company 
  • Possible full remote
  • Sponsorings to external conferences - organisation of internal and external Meetups
  • DIY workshops and internal events
  • Amazing work environment in Paris 17th, Barcelona & Bordeaux
  • 7 weeks holidays/year
  • Tickets restaurant
  • Health insurance
  • Parenthood

description:
Launched in 2013, ManoMano is the European leader specialised in DIY, home improvement and gardening online.  ManoMano brings together the largest offer of DIY & gardening online products. With more than 3600 seller partners and 10 million products, ManoMano brings together the largest offer across 6 countries : France, Belgium, Spain, Italy, Germany, United Kingdom.

We currently are 850 Manas & Manos, including a quarter of international talents and 24 nationalities, working in our 4 offices (Paris x2, Bordeaux and Barcelona). People are at the heart of ManoMano’s culture around our 3 core values : boldness, ingenuity and care.

Joining us is a tremendous human and business adventure ! We offer an ideal and (hyper)dynamic environment to put your skills on innovative and concrete projects on a European scale.
 
Take a look at our Blog : https://medium.com/manomano-tech

STELLENBESCHREIBUNG
Das deutsche ManoMano Team gibt es seit 5 Jahren, bereits 22 Deutsche arbeiten in Paris fürManoMano.de. ManoMano Deutschland spielt eine wichtige Rolle beim schnellen Wachstum von ManoMano. Im Team Business Development übernimmst Du eine Stelle mit operativer Verantwortung. Du wirst die besten deutschen Online-Händler ausfindig machen, diese auf der deutschen und den anderen internationalen Plattformen autonom integrieren und sie begleiten, damit diese ihr Verkaufspotenzial erreichen.

lists.content:
• Du entdeckst deutsche Händler mit hohem Potenzial für die deutsche und die internationalen Plattformen.
  • Du benchmarkst das Sortiment der Händler und analysiert das Potenzial für unseren Katalog.
  • Du übernimmst die Erstellung der Partnerschaft mit den Händlern und überwindest jedes Hindernis autonom und mit innovativen Lösungen.
  • Du verhandelst und erhältst die besten Konditionen, um die Partnerschaft so erfolgreich wie möglich zu gestalten.
  • Du begleitest Händler in den ersten Monaten (bis zu Übergabe an das Key Account Management) und bei der Internationalisierung.

• Du hast bereits einschlägige Berufserfahrung im B2C Vertrieb/Web/Verhandlungen.

  • Du zeichnest Dich aus durch:
  • Ein ausgeprägtes Maß an Verhandlungsfähigkeit und DurchsetzungsstärkeTeamorientierung
  • Eigeninitiative, Autonomie, Organisation und Flexibilität

  • Du sprichst Deutsch auf muttersprachlichem Niveau
  • Du hast gute Englischkenntnisse und/oder Französischkenntnisse
  • Du hast gute analytische Skills und Excel-Kenntnisse
  • Du interessierst Dich für das Web und für den Startup-Bereich + DIY

• Eine „Made in France“ Start-Up Atmosphäre mit toller Arbeitsstimmung
  • Möglichkeit zur Arbeit in 100% HomeOffice mit Wohnsitz in Deutschland oder Frankreich
  • Vom Unternehmen bezahlte Geschäftsreisen
  • Eine „Made in France“ Start-Up Atmosphäre mit toller Arbeitsstimmung
  • Viel Autonomie und Spielraum bei Deiner Arbeit
  • Eintauchen in die schnellwachsende, datenfokussierte Welt des E-Commerce
  • Ein internationales Umfeld (Mitarbeiter aus 25 Nationen)
  • Tolle Standorte in Paris / Bordeaux und Barcelona
  • Für Frankreich : “Tickets Restaurant“ (ein finanzieller Zuschuss zum Mittagessen), Zuschuss zu den Kosten für öffentliche Verkehrsmittel
  • Für Deutschland : monatlicher Homeoffice-Zuschuss
  • Französisch- oder Englischunterricht
  • (Virtuelle) Company- und Team-Events, DIY-Ateliers
  • Regelmäßige Entwicklungsgespräche und interne Mobility-Angebote

descriptionPlain:
Launched in 2013, ManoMano is the
European leader specialised in DIY, home improvement and gardening online. ManoMano brings together the largest offer of
DIY & gardening online products. With more than 3600 seller partners and 10 million products, ManoMano brings together
the largest offer across 6 countries : France, Belgium, Spain, Italy, Germany, United Kingdom. 

We currently are 850
Manas & Manos, including a quarter of international talents and 24 nationalities, working in our 4 offices (Paris x2,
Bordeaux and Barcelona). People are at the heart of ManoMano’s culture around our 3 core values : boldness, ingenuity
and care.

Joining us is a tremendous human and business adventure ! We offer an ideal and (hyper)dynamic environment
to put your skills on innovative and concrete projects on a European scale.
 
Take a look at our Blog :
https://medium.com/manomano-tech

Nous souhaitons poursuivre notre croissance sur les marchés du bricolage & jardinage
en ligne. Pour ce faire, ManoMano est à la recherche de Super CatMan et CatWoman pour accélérer le développement de ses
catégories bricolage et jardinage. 
Au sein de la division Category Management, tu es en particulier responsable du
développement de la verticale “Jardin et animalerie” sur le marché français. Tu es un(e) véritable expert(e) et apportes
tes connaissances à l’ensemble de l’organisation. 

Tes missions principales sont les suivantes :

Catalogue :


Tu interviens dans la définition d’une stratégie permettant de renforcer le catalogue de ton univers (jardin et
animalerie). Tu es un(e) super(be) analyste et l’offre n’a aucun secret pour toi ; tu mènes des études, des analyses
comparatives et établis des recommandations et plans d’actions afin d’atteindre les objectifs de développement du
chiffre d’affaires : 

- Analyse du marché du jardin et de l’animalerie : tendances, pénétration digitale et
opportunités
- Analyse comparative de l’offre Mano Mano et du marché: top produits, marques, catégories, gamme de
prix…
- Construction et recommandations de produits sur l’univers extérieur (jardin et animalerie)

E-merchandising
et animation commerciale : 

Tu sais te mettre dans la peau des clients et structurer le catalogue pour faciliter
l’achat ; tu interviens pour booster les ventes : 

- Animation des ventes : catégories, sous-catégories et produits à
mettre en avant, identification des best-sellers et des produits incontournables du catalogue, gestion des têtes de
gondole
- Identification des temps forts de l’année, support à l’équipe en charge de l’animation commerciale et au
sourcing pour définir le calendrier commercial
- Travail sur la nomenclature et l’arborescence du catalogue avec un
esprit orienté client
- Travail sur les fiches produit et les produits complémentaires (descriptif, conseil,
bundles)
- Développement de notre capacité à fournir un conseil pertinent aux clients (avis, fiches conseil, produits
complémentaires etc.), propre à la catégorie, en collaboration avec les équipes dédiées (au produit, au marketing, à la
production de contenus).

Pilotage de la performance : 

Au sein de ManoMano, tu es responsable de la performance de
ta verticale : 

- Mise en place et développement des outils de suivi et de reporting
- Intervention lors des
business reviews, aux côtés des autres Category Managers
- Définition de recommandations opérationnelles et de plans
d’action, suivi

Profil recherché : 

Tu as déjà fait tes armes dans le secteur de l’ameublement et décoration, dont
tu possèdes une connaissance approfondie, dans l’idéal, tant marché que terrain. Tu connais parfaitement les clients,
leurs attentes, la façon dont ils achètent, et les rayons “Jardin et animalerie” n’ont aucun secret pour toi. Une
expérience dans l’e-commerce ou une structure ayant connu une forte croissance comme ManoMano est un plus. Nous
recherchons quelqu’un avec les qualités suivantes : 
- Forte connaissance de la verticale, de ses produits et
particularités, des attentes clients
- Forte sensibilité aux enjeux de l’expérience client
- Personnalité
bienveillante, innovante, inspirée et inspirante
- Forte vision stratégique et dimension opérationnelle
- Agilité et
réactivité
- Aisance dans les analyses et le quanti
- Sachant parler anglais

Tu reporteras au responsable de
l’équipe Category Management, rattaché au marketing.

Tu as déjà fait tes armes dans le secteur de l’ameublement et décoration, dont tu possèdes une connaissance approfondie, dans l’idéal, tant marché que terrain. Tu connais parfaitement les clients, leurs attentes, la façon dont ils achètent, et les rayons “Jardin et animalerie” n’ont aucun secret pour toi. Une expérience dans l’e-commerce ou une structure ayant connu une forte croissance comme ManoMano est un plus. Nous recherchons quelqu’un avec les qualités suivantes :
- Forte connaissance de la verticale, de ses produits et particularités, des attentes clients
- Forte sensibilité aux enjeux de l’expérience client
- Personnalité bienveillante, innovante, inspirée et inspirante
- Forte vision stratégique et dimension opérationnelle
- Agilité et réactivité
- Aisance dans les analyses et le quanti
- Sachant parler anglais

Tu reporteras au responsable de l’équipe Category Management, rattaché au marketing.

description:
Launched in 2013, ManoMano is the European leader specialised in DIY, home improvement and gardening online.  ManoMano brings together the largest offer of DIY & gardening online products. With more than 3600 seller partners and 10 million products, ManoMano brings together the largest offer across 6 countries : France, Belgium, Spain, Italy, Germany, United Kingdom.

We currently are 850 Manas & Manos, including a quarter of international talents and 24 nationalities, working in our 4 offices (Paris x2, Bordeaux and Barcelona). People are at the heart of ManoMano’s culture around our 3 core values : boldness, ingenuity and care.

Joining us is a tremendous human and business adventure ! We offer an ideal and (hyper)dynamic environment to put your skills on innovative and concrete projects on a European scale.
 
Take a look at our Blog : https://medium.com/manomano-tech

ManoMano, déjà positionné comme l’acteur web de référence pour les particuliers sur le bricolage et le jardinage, souhaite devenir non seulement le fournisseur numéro 1 des artisans pour leurs achats de matériaux, mais également un véritable partenaire dans leur quotidien.  

Au sein de l’équipe commerciale, tu devras développer les ventes auprès de nos clients professionnels du bâtiment et de répondre à toutes leurs questions. 

Tu auras un rôle de conseiller(e) technico-commercial(e) B2B.

lists.content:
• Développer les ventes auprès de nos clients professionnels, en apportant le meilleur conseil métier ;
  • Maximiser la satisfaction de nos clients, en répondant à toutes leurs questions dans le respect des objectifs de qualité ManoMano ;
  • Contribuer à toutes actions commerciales visant à aller chercher de nouveaux clients, tester de nouvelles approches, fidéliser un client existant ;
  • Développer ton niveau de connaissance et de compétences sur les produits : par des formations internes, de la veille.

• Niveau Bac + 2/3 (cursus technique et commercial) ou expérimenté dans le secteur du BTP avec une appétence pour la vente.
  • Minimum 2 à 4 ans d’expérience commerciale dans la vente de matériaux de construction, en outillage, en équipements électroportatifs, voire sur les chantiers…
  • Une bonne connaissance générale du monde du bâtiment et des professionnels
  • 100% orienté(e) client et satisfaction client
  • Autonome et adaptable (capable de travailler dans un environnement en constante évolution)
  • Un esprit d’équipe et un excellent relationnel
  • Rigueur et capacité à suivre les process
  • Bonne culture digitale

• Package salarial attractif (Fixe + Variable + Challenges)
  • Équilibre vie pro / vie perso- Carte de restaurant, mutuelle, participation au transport
  • 2/3 journées de télétravail par semaine
  • La dimension internationale (France, Italie, Espagne, Royaume-Uni, Allemagne)
  • Les évolutions internes, la progression, la montée en compétences, les formations…

• Entretien téléphonique avec un(e) talent recruiter
  • Entretien visio avec Grégory, le sales manager
  • Entretien visio avec Agathe, la head of sales

descriptionPlain:
Launched in 2013, ManoMano is the
European leader specialised in DIY, home improvement and gardening online. ManoMano brings together the largest offer of
DIY & gardening online products. With more than 3600 seller partners and 10 million products, ManoMano brings together
the largest offer across 6 countries : France, Belgium, Spain, Italy, Germany, United Kingdom. 

We currently are 850
Manas & Manos, including a quarter of international talents and 24 nationalities, working in our 4 offices (Paris x2,
Bordeaux and Barcelona). People are at the heart of ManoMano’s culture around our 3 core values : boldness, ingenuity
and care.

Joining us is a tremendous human and business adventure ! We offer an ideal and (hyper)dynamic environment
to put your skills on innovative and concrete projects on a European scale.
 
Take a look at our Blog :
https://medium.com/manomano-tech

As part of the Category Management team, you handle the catalog experience in your
country and are responsible to present the right product assortment with the best buying experience. You are involved in
and support the activation of a cross team country catalog strategy. You manage the activity with a highly developed
analytical and customer sense and demonstrate curiosity and great intellectual agility. You are able to collaborate
closely with other teams. You will report to the senior category manager in charge of international markets. Your
missions are the following:

Category development: you support the team strategies to develop our business, with a
category approach:
- Market and competition study to identify the priority targets for development in Italy
- Analysis
of product offering and identification of offer development opportunities (ranges, offer completeness) transmitted to
sourcing teams and monitoring of their activation
- Contribution to the objectives and action plan definition
(involving the category management, product information, commercial animation, sourcing, logistics etc.
teams)

Ecommerce, emerchandising and commercial animation: you leverage the work done on the French website to
structure the catalog and make products easily accessible to our visitors:
- Improvement of the product categories (SEO
optimisation) and quality of our categorisation (dataset creation for algorithms)
- Improvement of the filter
experience and work on the product attributes
- Collaboration with the product information management team to identify
areas of the catalog requiring specific enrichment work
- Deployment of guided navigation filters and in page
displays
- Collaboration with the promotion team to align the commercial animation plan with local
specificities

Performance: You report for the turnover at category level:
- Monitoring of key performance
indicators, analysis of traffic, usage & purchasing behavior to improve performance
- Reporting on the performance and
participation in performance committees
- Identification and animation of action plans to support the performance at
category x country level
- You represent the category management team and are the key contact for international teams
(sourcing, communication, logistics…)

PROFILE : 

You are fluent at Italian. You already have experience in project
management, consulting or ecommerce. You are looking forward to working in an international, enriching and challenging
environment. Knowing the Home Improvement market (DIY, Garden or Home Furnishing) would be a strong plus. 

We are
looking for someone with the following qualities: customer oriented minds, curious, drawn to the intellectual
challenges, strong analytical abilities, agile and reactive. Good interpersonal skillsCaring, open minded and inspiring
personality.

- Collaboration with the promotion team to align the commercial animation plan with local specificities

Performance: You report for the turnover at category level:
- Monitoring of key performance indicators, analysis of traffic, usage & purchasing behavior to improve performance
- Reporting on the performance and participation in performance committees
- Identification and animation of action plans to support the performance at category x country level
- You represent the category management team and are the key contact for international teams (sourcing, communication, logistics…)

PROFILE :

You are fluent at Italian. You already have experience in project management, consulting or ecommerce. You are looking forward to working in an international, enriching and challenging environment. Knowing the Home Improvement market (DIY, Garden or Home Furnishing) would be a strong plus. 

We are looking for someone with the following qualities: customer oriented minds, curious, drawn to the intellectual challenges, strong analytical abilities, agile and reactive. Good interpersonal skillsCaring, open minded and inspiring personality.

Launched in 2013, ManoMano is the European leader
specialised in DIY, home improvement and gardening online. ManoMano brings together the largest offer of DIY & gardening
online products. With more than 3600 seller partners and 10 million products, ManoMano brings together the largest offer
across 6 countries : France, Belgium, Spain, Italy, Germany, United Kingdom. 

We currently are 850 Manas & Manos,
including a quarter of international talents and 24 nationalities, working in our 4 offices (Paris x2, Bordeaux and
Barcelona). People are at the heart of ManoMano’s culture around our 3 core values : boldness, ingenuity and
care.

Joining us is a tremendous human and business adventure ! We offer an ideal and (hyper)dynamic environment to
put your skills on innovative and concrete projects on a European scale.
 
Take a look at our Blog :
https://medium.com/manomano-tech


We, the Studio team, are part of the Brand and Communication team within the
Marketing department.
With a team of currently 8 (composed of project managers, art director and designers) the Studio
acts as the in-house creative services unit providing support to all Manomano internal teams with the best-in-class
creative assets.

To accompany our development, we are looking for a Senior Creative Services Producer to lead all
incoming creative requests from end-to-end.
The ideal candidate will have a strong sense of organisation and will be
experienced in leading small to complex projects in the creative marketing field. The role requires solid communication
skills to ensure effective cross-collaboration between teams involved and make sure projects are timely and seamlessly
delivered.
Main stakeholders of the role are within the Growth and Marketing department, but not only.

The Creative
Services Producer position reports to the Creative Services Manager.


Missions
Project Manager responsibilities
-
Lead, execute, and facilitate projects, from one shot demands to complex requests,
- Make sure content produced is
coherent and consistent with requester’s objective, brand tone and visual identity,
- Collaborate in the best way to
ensure alignment with all involved stakeholders,
- Obtain approvals, ensure correct developments and deliveries of all
expected assets,
- Communicate effectively processes, timelines and remove roadblocks as they arise,
- Manage the
overall planning of your projects and guarantee timely deliveries,
- Develop strong and trustful relationships with
your internal clients and stakeholders,
- Provide constructive feedbacks to enhanced projects, collaboration and
workflows.

#Li-Remote #Li-Hybride

& Missions
