The Payment feature team is responsible for providing payment methods to ManoMano’s customers. ManoMano manage payment of billion euro annual transaction requiring security (PCI-DSS), fraud detection and money flow control. All connected to multiple PSPs to provide the payment method corresponding to the needs of our customers in all markets.Your challenge as a Staff Backend Engineer will be to help the team to create microservices, ensuring the scalability, robustness (fault tolerance), consistency and performance required by using concepts such as idempotency, circuit breaker, services distributed, reactive architecture, back pressure and more to guarantee a quality payment service for years to come.

CONTEXT

- 25 feature teams in January 2021 and expect to grow x2 in next year
- Agile mindset is there since the birth of ManoMano
- Main default method is Scrum within 2 weeks iteration
- 3 offices: Paris, Bordeaux and Barcelona
- Language for writing is English; speaking is english by default or french, spanish, german...

MAIN ACTIVITIES

You will join a team, composed of 4 Developers + 1 Lead + 1 Product Manager, in order to create, in collaboration with the product and UX / UI teams, an amazing experience for the merchants and the customers.

As a Staff Software Engineer in this team, you will have to :

- Design and develop features with a high quality standard
- Assimilate business context and company expectations to be creative and relevant
- Learn & teach through code reviews
- Improve the quality and testing of technical components
- Deploy your code up to production and be involved in monitoring it
- Coach and help developers to grow and improve, be a skilled leader to them

TECHNICAL STACK :

* Microservices
- Java >= 11 soon 17 with SpringBoot 2 / Kotlin
- MySQL, Postgre
- RabbitMQ, Kafka
- Redis
- Gitlab & CI/CD
- Docker
- AWS EKS / Kubernetes
- Jira / Slack

REQUIREMENTS

- +7 years of experience as a Backend Developer
- High understanding of Micro-service Architecture: DDD, SOLID, Distributed Systems architecture.
- Unit Testing, Acceptance Testing, Integration Testing, Load, Testing, Contract Testing
- Creative / Innovative
- Knowledge in Monitoring, Alerting
- Ability to design new systems and features
- Team spirit and excellent interpersonal skills, as well as a good sense of humor!
- Software Craftsmanship
- Previous experiences in Payment would be great
- Fluent in english

INTERVIEW PROCESS :

1/ Phone interview with a Talent Recruiter
+ Technical Test (CodinGame)
2/ Zoom interview with a Team Lead + Software Engineer
3/ Final Zoom interview with an Engineering Manager or VP Engineer

descriptionPlain:
Launched in 2013, ManoMano is the European
    leader specialised in DIY, home improvement and gardening online. ManoMano brings together the largest offer of DIY
    & gardening online products. With more than 3600 seller partners and 10 million products, ManoMano brings together
    the largest offer across 6 countries : France, Belgium, Spain, Italy, Germany, United Kingdom. 

We currently are
    850 Manas & Manos, including a quarter of international talents and 24 nationalities, working in our 4 offices
    (Paris x2, Bordeaux and Barcelona). People are at the heart of ManoMano’s culture around our 3 core values :
    boldness, ingenuity and care.

Joining us is a tremendous human and business adventure ! We offer an ideal and
    (hyper)dynamic environment to put your skills on innovative and concrete projects on a European scale.
 
Take a
    look at our Blog : https://medium.com/manomano-tech

ManoMano, already positioned as European leader in DIY, wants
    to propose the best online experience in DIY ecommerce. For this, ManoMano is launching excellent tech teams, and is
    looking for a Solutions Architect in Bordeaux. 

MAIN CHALLENGES

As Solutions Architect your missions will be
    both challenging and fascinating:

- Specify and maintain functional architecture of the platform ,
- enable
    platform evolutivity in order to answer business needs,
- enable growth in terms of platform traffic and volume but
    also in terms of number of technical contributors,
- provide long-term functional solutions,
- provide expertise
    to ensure platform performance, ecosystem integration and flexibility,
- audit performance, security and
    reliability of current systems,
- analyse issues and optimization points of technical architecture,
- define
    technical roadmap with the other architects and the core developers,
- define and hold technical projects,
-
    coordinate strategy with business teams and other technical teams (engineer managers, lead developer community, data
    science team, QA team, devops team...) in an European context.

REQUIREMENTS

- 6+ year experience in web
    (consulting/dev., retailers…),
- fluent in English (verbal and written),
- like to communicate, curiosity,
    initiative, pragmatism in a collaborative and challenging business & tech environment,
- skills to explain
    complicated systems to non technical teams,
- An understanding of the stakes of the company (DIY best in class
    platform & services, customer experience, data driven…),
- experience in solution design, implementing enterprise
    software solutions,
- experience in Data, API and events driven architecture: data modelling and cartography, API &
    events design and governance.

WE DO AT MANOMANO

- Software craftsmanship: clean code, testing, code
    review...
- Devops: CI/CD, observability...
- React, PHP/Symfony, Java SpringBoot, Python, Go, NodeJS, MariaDB,
    MongoDB, ElasticSearch, Redis, RabbitMQ, Docker, Linux, AWS…
GSuite, Slack, Confluence, Draw.io,
    JIRA...

We're actively seeking applications from candidates of all backgrounds.

If all the above rings a bell, it probably means that we are meant to meet each other ! Please get in touch.« So, come and plant the seeds of your success and gather the fruits of your labour »

The information collected on this form is recorded in a file used by ManoMano - Colibri SAS so that we can process your application.   
The data is kept for 2 years from the date of your application. You can access your data, rectify it, request its deletion or exercise your right to limit the processing of your data. You can also exercise your right to the portability of your data. Consult the cnil.fr website for more information on your rights. 
To exercise these rights or if you have any questions about the processing of your data under this scheme, you can contact our data protection officer by writing to dpo@manomano.com.  
If, after having contacted us, you feel that your "Data Protection" rights have not been respected, you may submit a complaint to the CNIL.
descriptionPlain:
Launched in 2013, ManoMano is the European
    leader specialised in DIY, home improvement and gardening online. ManoMano brings together the largest offer of DIY
    & gardening online products. With more than 3600 seller partners and 10 million products, ManoMano brings together
    the largest offer across 6 countries : France, Belgium, Spain, Italy, Germany, United Kingdom. 

We currently are
    850 Manas & Manos, including a quarter of international talents and 24 nationalities, working in our 4 offices
    (Paris x2, Bordeaux and Barcelona). People are at the heart of ManoMano’s culture around our 3 core values :
    boldness, ingenuity and care.

Joining us is a tremendous human and business adventure ! We offer an ideal and
    (hyper)dynamic environment to put your skills on innovative and concrete projects on a European scale.
 
Take a
    look at our Blog : https://medium.com/manomano-tech

Launched in 2013, ManoMano is the European leader specialised
    in DIY, home improvement and gardening online. ManoMano brings together the largest offer of DIY & gardening online
    products. With more than 3600 seller partners and 10 million products, ManoMano brings together the largest offer
    across 6 countries : France, Belgium, Spain, Italy, Germany, United Kingdom.

We currently are 800 Manas & Manos,
    including a quarter of international talents and 24 nationalities, working in our 4 offices (Paris x2, Bordeaux and
    Barcelona). People are at the heart of ManoMano’s culture around our 3 core values : boldness, ingenuity and
    care.

Joining us is a tremendous human and business adventure ! We offer an ideal and (hyper)dynamic environment
    to put your skills on innovative and concrete projects on a European scale. 

Take a look at our Blog :
    https://medium.com/manomano-tech

As a Staff Site Reliability Engineer, your missions will be to build and operate
    systems in a challenging way :

- Implement the tools and processes of deployment and industrialization that
    ensure the sustainability working of web applications, track the evolution of these applications over time. Be a
    strong stakeholder of building a platform-on-demand.
- Investigate and check systems, analyze and resolve
    performance and scalability issues.
- Lead and organize build project with the Platform team leader: 
 *define
    target and roadmap with the support of architect and the core engineers
 * make architecture choices
 * prioritize
    technical tasks
 * help teams to reach objectives 
- Evangelize good practices and participate in building a true
    tech community.
- Challenge organization and bring solutions to improve ourselves.

Which skills we expect
    :

Soft skills : 
- Be Bold, Ingenious & Carefull
- Like to communicate, curiosity, initiative, pragmatism in a
    collaborative and challenging business & tech environment: Project management Mentoring, coaching, training, strong
    communication skills
- Ability to evangelize on SRE organization & problematics within tech departement

Hard
    skills : 
- Strong expertise in large-scale and resilient infrastructures (physical and virtual) and DevOps tooling
    and infra automation language.
- Knowledge about the AWS public cloud
- Good knowledge on OS and network
-
    Knowledge of API & MicroServices Architecture
- Technologies requirements : 
* Systems & Software: Debian, Docker,
    Kubernetes, nginx, Redis, GitLab
* Mesh : Consul & Envoy is a plusDB : MariaDB, PostgreSql / Mongo
* DB knowledge
    is a plus
* Event system : Kafka Monitoring management skills: SLO/SLA, ...
* Automation: Ansible, Terraform,
    Packer, Knowledge of a CI system 

Others :
- Graduated from an engineering school or equivalent
-5+ year
    experience in web
- Fluent in English (verbal and written), French and Spanish are a plus
- Good understanding of
    ops technologies

We do in ManoMano :
- Software craftsmanship: clean code, testing, peer programming, code
    review…
- Devops: IAC, CI/CD, observability…
- Language/Framework : React, PHP/Symfony, Java; Kotlin, SpringBoot,
    Gradle, Quarkus, Python, Go, NodeJS, Kafka, RabbitMQ, …
- Tools : Google Workspace, Slack, Confluence, Draw.io,
    Miro, JIRA…
- Monitoring : Datadog

Joining us is a tremendous human and business adventure ! We offer an ideal and (hyper)dynamic environment to put your skills on innovative and concrete projects on a European scale.

As a Staff Site Reliability Engineer, your missions will be to build and operate systems in a challenging way :

- Implement the tools and processes of deployment and industrialization that ensure the sustainability working of web applications, track the evolution of these applications over time. Be a strong stakeholder of building a platform-on-demand.
- Investigate and check systems, analyze and resolve performance and scalability issues.
- Lead and organize build project with the Platform team leader: 
*define target and roadmap with the support of architect and the core engineers
* make architecture choices
* prioritize technical tasks
* help teams to reach objectives
- Evangelize good practices and participate in building a true tech community.
- Challenge organization and bring solutions to improve ourselves.

Which skills we expect :

Soft skills : 
- Be Bold, Ingenious & Carefull
- Like to communicate, curiosity, initiative, pragmatism in a collaborative and challenging business & tech environment: Project management Mentoring, coaching, training, strong communication skills
- Ability to evangelize on SRE organization & problematics within tech departement

Hard skills : 
- Strong expertise in large-scale and resilient infrastructures (physical and virtual) and DevOps tooling and infra automation language.
- Knowledge about the AWS public cloud
- Good knowledge on OS and network
- Knowledge of API & MicroServices Architecture
- Technologies requirements :
* Systems & Software: Debian, Docker, Kubernetes, nginx, Redis, GitLab
* Mesh : Consul & Envoy is a plusDB : MariaDB, PostgreSql / Mongo
* DB knowledge is a plus
* Event system : Kafka Monitoring management skills: SLO/SLA, ...
* Automation: Ansible, Terraform, Packer, Knowledge of a CI system

Others :
- Graduated from an engineering school or equivalent
-5+ year experience in web
- Fluent in English (verbal and written), French and Spanish are a plus
- Good understanding of ops technologies

We do in ManoMano :
- Software craftsmanship: clean code, testing, peer programming, code review…
- Devops: IAC, CI/CD, observability…
- Language/Framework : React, PHP/Symfony, Java; Kotlin, SpringBoot, Gradle, Quarkus, Python, Go, NodeJS, Kafka, RabbitMQ, …
- Tools : Google Workspace, Slack, Confluence, Draw.io, Miro, JIRA…
- Monitoring : Datadog

lists.text:
What we can offer you at
    ManoMano
lists.content:
• People: Smart/ diverse backgrounds / international environment/ A positive, supportive & dynamic atmosphere
  • Work: office/ hybrid/ full remote  
  • Salary: competitive salary package
  • Technology: Get a laptop you love to do your best work
  • Time off: 30 days of paid vacation
  • Flexible working hours including Friday afternoons off.
  • Sports: free gym membership provided by Andjoy
  • Healthcare: Private Health Insurance provided by AXA
  • Food: Ticket Restaurant (flexible remuneration)
  • Transportation: Ticket transportation (flexible remuneration)
  • Career development: 4 weekly hours dedicated to training with digital and interactive platforms. English training included.
  • ManoMano monthly discounts

descriptionPlain:
Launched in 2013,
    ManoMano is the European leader specialised in DIY, home improvement and gardening online. ManoMano brings together
    the largest offer of DIY & gardening online products. With more than 3600 seller partners and 10 million products,
    ManoMano brings together the largest offer across 6 countries : France, Belgium, Spain, Italy, Germany, United
    Kingdom. 

We currently are 850 Manas & Manos, including a quarter of international talents and 24 nationalities,
    working in our 4 offices (Paris x2, Bordeaux and Barcelona). People are at the heart of ManoMano’s culture around
    our 3 core values : boldness, ingenuity and care.

Joining us is a tremendous human and business adventure ! We
    offer an ideal and (hyper)dynamic environment to put your skills on innovative and concrete projects on a European
    scale.
 
Take a look at our Blog : https://medium.com/manomano-tech

ManoFulfillment is a strategic pillar of
    ManoMano growth. It enables sellers - from all around the world - to benefit from ManoMano best in class transport
    and logistic experiences and grow their sales across europe. When sellers join the ManoFulfillment program, they
    benefit from a sales uplift thanks to a better customer promise (free shipping, express delivery, large choice of
    delivery options, etc). 

With a tremendous growth in volumes expected for the next 2 to 3 years, and a level of
    complexity on physical and IT flows that is increasing exponentially, ManoMano is recruiting a talented France
    Transport Lead.

France Transport Lead is in charge of defining and managing the french transport panel. Main
    tasks includes 

- Define the best transport strategy for your market (delivery option, delivery promise, cost)
-
    Manage day-to-day operations with our carrier partners, in order to ensure the highest quality in term of on-time
    delivery, quality of service
- Organize and manage the weekly, monthly and quarterly business review with our
    partners
- Manage the transport costs: analyse monthly costs, identify improvement opportunity and engage with all
    the stakeholders to ensure the implementation
- Improve our offer, by building new processes and referencing new
    carrier enabling to increase the diversity of products we can handle in our fulfillment program

Your work will
    have a considerable impact on ManoMano’s growth.

Your missions :
- Define Transport Purchasing Strategy to
    provide best-in class transport solution
- Lead Tender, business negotiations & pricing
- Lead carrier contract
    creation and review
- Analyse Carrier performance and communicate weekly
- Fix best in-class standards for carrier
    contracts (SLAs, processes, risk management)
- Propose and implement continuous improvement projects, including
    inside our DC
- Coordinate IT developments with the tech team for new features implementation
- Contribute to
    develop a responsible supply-chain
- Identify and implement innovative solutions to offer the best customer
    experience
- Work closely with the finance team to identify costs improvement opportunities

Preferred experience
    : 
- Strategic thinking
- Excellent business negotiation skills
- Transport market expertise (last mile, parcel,
    FTL, groupage…)
- Transport operation experience (transport plan, network optimisation)
- Very strong analytical
    skills required
- Autonomous, business driven, strong rigour in the workplace
- Curious and passionate about
    innovation in ecommerce/marketplace
- Fluency in French and English
- Able to work in a constantly evolving
    scale-up environment

Position eligible to full remote in France (few business trips to the French warehouse to
    plan)

Launched in 2013, ManoMano is the European leader specialised in DIY, home improvement and gardening online.  ManoMano brings together the largest offer of DIY & gardening online products. With more than 3600 seller partners and 10 million products, ManoMano brings together the largest offer across 6 countries : France, Belgium, Spain, Italy, Germany, United Kingdom.

We currently are 850 Manas & Manos, including a quarter of international talents and 24 nationalities, working in our 4 offices (Paris x2, Bordeaux and Barcelona). People are at the heart of ManoMano’s culture around our 3 core values : boldness, ingenuity and care.

Joining us is a tremendous human and business adventure ! We offer an ideal and (hyper)dynamic environment to put your skills on innovative and concrete projects on a European scale.
 
Take a look at our Blog : https://medium.com/manomano-tech

ManoFulfillment is a strategic pillar of ManoMano growth. It enables sellers - from all around the world - to benefit from ManoMano best in class transport and logistic experiences and grow their sales across europe. When sellers join the ManoFulfillment program, they benefit from a sales uplift thanks to a better customer promise (free shipping, express delivery, large choice of delivery options, etc). 

With a tremendous growth in volumes expected for the next 2 to 3 years, and a level of complexity on physical and IT flows that is increasing exponentially, ManoMano is recruiting a talented France Transport Lead.

France Transport Lead is in charge of defining and managing the french transport panel. Main tasks includes 

- Define the best transport strategy for your market (delivery option, delivery promise, cost)
- Manage day-to-day operations with our carrier partners, in order to ensure the highest quality in term of on-time delivery, quality of service
- Organize and manage the weekly, monthly and quarterly business review with our partners
- Manage the transport costs: analyse monthly costs, identify improvement opportunity and engage with all the stakeholders to ensure the implementation
- Improve our offer, by building new processes and referencing new carrier enabling to increase the diversity of products we can handle in our fulfillment program

Your work will have a considerable impact on ManoMano’s growth.

Your missions :
- Define Transport Purchasing Strategy to provide best-in class transport solution
- Lead Tender, business negotiations & pricing
- Lead carrier contract creation and review
- Analyse Carrier performance and communicate weekly
- Fix best in-class standards for carrier contracts (SLAs, processes, risk management)
- Propose and implement continuous improvement projects, including inside our DC
- Coordinate IT developments with the tech team for new features implementation
- Contribute to develop a responsible supply-chain
- Identify and implement innovative solutions to offer the best customer experience
- Work closely with the finance team to identify costs improvement opportunities

Preferred experience : 
- Strategic thinking
- Excellent business negotiation skills
- Transport market expertise (last mile, parcel, FTL, groupage…)
- Transport operation experience (transport plan, network optimisation)
- Very strong analytical skills required
- Autonomous, business driven, strong rigour in the workplace
- Curious and passionate about innovation in ecommerce/marketplace
- Fluency in French and English
- Able to work in a constantly evolving scale-up environment

Position eligible to full remote in France (few business trips to the French warehouse to plan)

descriptionPlain:
Launched
    in 2013, ManoMano is the European leader specialised in DIY, home improvement and gardening online. ManoMano brings
    together the largest offer of DIY & gardening online products. With more than 3600 seller partners and 10 million
    products, ManoMano brings together the largest offer across 6 countries : France, Belgium, Spain, Italy, Germany,
    United Kingdom. 

We currently are 850 Manas & Manos, including a quarter of international talents and 24
    nationalities, working in our 4 offices (Paris x2, Bordeaux and Barcelona). People are at the heart of ManoMano’s
    culture around our 3 core values : boldness, ingenuity and care.

Joining us is a tremendous human and business
    adventure ! We offer an ideal and (hyper)dynamic environment to put your skills on innovative and concrete projects
    on a European scale.
 
Take a look at our Blog : https://medium.com/manomano-tech

To consolidate its position
    as the European Online Home Improvement leader, ManoMano has put technology at the heart of its strategy.
We are
    convinced it is by fluidly delivering qualitative products that we will be able to offer our clients and merchants
    all the functionalities to revolutionise their online experience. As a fast growing company, we are always on the
    look for ingenious and passionate people. 

Background & Missions

Within the Marketing & Data department, and
    reporting directly to International communication Lead , you will be responsible for building and developing the
    ManoMano brand awareness, brand love & consideration in the UK on its different target groups (Corporate, Consumer,
    Sellers & B2B).

Your missions:

Create a real local flavor & Lead Communications strategy for the UK ensuring
    its alignment with ManoMano's global communications strategy, business strategy for the UK and company's
    customer-centric and data driven approach.

Challenge & optimize global communication decisions to ensure UK
    market relevance with a deep understanding of culture & landscape (business, digital, tech & DIY ecosystem, consumer
    & B2B) based on data, market & brand insights.

    delivering recommendations & new ideas:

description:
Launched in 2013, ManoMano is the European leader specialised in DIY, home improvement and gardening online.  ManoMano brings together the largest offer of DIY & gardening online products. With more than 3600 seller partners and 10 million products, ManoMano brings together the largest offer across 6 countries : France, Belgium, Spain, Italy, Germany, United Kingdom.

We currently are 850 Manas & Manos, including a quarter of international talents and 24 nationalities, working in our 4 offices (Paris x2, Bordeaux and Barcelona). People are at the heart of ManoMano’s culture around our 3 core values : boldness, ingenuity and care.

Joining us is a tremendous human and business adventure ! We offer an ideal and (hyper)dynamic environment to put your skills on innovative and concrete projects on a European scale.
 
Take a look at our Blog : https://medium.com/manomano-tech

To consolidate its position as the European Online Home Improvement  leader, ManoMano has put technology at the heart of its strategy.
We are convinced it is by fluidly delivering qualitative products that we will be able to offer our clients and merchants all the functionalities to revolutionise their online experience. As a fast growing company, we are always on the look for ingenious and passionate people. 

Background & Missions

Within the Marketing & Data department, and reporting directly  to International communication Lead , you will be responsible for building and developing the ManoMano brand awareness, brand love & consideration in the UK on its different target groups (Corporate, Consumer, Sellers & B2B).

Your missions:

Create a real local flavor & Lead Communications strategy for the UK ensuring its alignment with ManoMano's global communications strategy, business strategy for the UK and company's customer-centric and data driven approach.

Challenge & optimize global communication decisions to ensure UK market relevance with a deep understanding of culture & landscape (business, digital, tech & DIY ecosystem, consumer & B2B) based on data, market & brand insights. 

Create & execute the UK strategy & report progress / challenges, delivering recommendations & new ideas:
B2C & B2B communications (Social, Influence, Content, SEO, Partnerships,  Events...)
Media & Advertisinglocalisation in partnership with Global Media & Brand teams
Develop marketing integration with cross functional internal partners (CRM, Sourcing, Promo and Commerce, etc)
Partner with Country Market Lead to support and promote region voice and ambition
Corporate communications (Thought Leadership, Press relations & public relations, Social, Crisis communication...)

Lead the team of 1or 2 Drive agencies (PR, Influence...) & partners to drive best in class results, and incremental growth YoY

Manage budget with 100% budget accuracy & in full compliance with ManoMano guidelines

Profile requirement 

Degree in Marketing, Communications, Public Relations or relevant field
8+ years of experience in multicultural marketing & communication environment
Creative / Innovative / Out of the box thinker
Ability to navigate from C-Level discussions to build messaging & promote ManoMano global business strategy to building and monitoring AB test digital campaign
Strong digital & ecommerce background* English proficient
Customer Centric & Data Driven
Avid learner with a strong growth mindset:  setting up high standards for you & the team* Team spirit and excellent interpersonal skills
Nice to have:conversational French
